name: Tree Truck
description:
“You got tree bark in your truck’s back”

Play as a truck carrying a tree on its back, chasing Cloud rain that defies logic and the law of physics in the middle of an urban city with one purpose, To grow the Tree.

This game was made for Kenney GameJam 2022, the theme is "Growth" and the assets are from Kenney.

How to play 

1. Use WASD or Analog to move the truck depending on the Platform you use.

2. Chase the rain, by following the direction of the arrow the tree needs for its growth

3. Keep your tree hydrated, your tree will shrink and die if you don't get the water for long enough

4. The time is up when it touches 3 minutes, you will get the result of your effort
